title: No Vayne's price reduction record. Does that mean Vayne will get a new price reductionï¼Ÿ

embed.description: Permanent Champion Price Reduction We are reducing champion prices on a fixed schedule (based primarily on champion release dates). This plan involves ongoing reductions of IP and RP prices of older champions, as well as increasing the time you have to earn IP between champion releases.

body: No Vayne's price reduction history in kick off plan. Does that mean Vayne will get a double price reduction in next 4800 ip champ price reduction???? XD{{champion:67}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
lol wut

May have been an error on their side. Post this on the misc. boards so a red sees it.
